vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δεξιο-λάβος [ᾰ], ὁ,
spearman: in plural, guards, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: spearman; other sources: bowman, slinger, bodyguard
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
spearman; other sources: bowman, slinger, bodyguard
one posted on the right hand; a flank guard; a light armed spearman, Acts 23:23*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (signicado incierto) tal vez soldado, soldado de infantería, lancero
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: lính cầm giáo; một người ném lao
